channel.title: *~*~*Rune Wars*~*~* Log in & Fu*kin Pk! 10-15 events/day --- {24/7}
channel.description:
Ok new and improved, Me and a Buddy decided to pimp it out, and now its packed with pking fun :) here it is...
[b]BACK UP! THIS TIME IT WILL BE UP FOR MONTHS![/b]
[URL=http://imageshack.us][IMG]http://img12.imageshack.us/img12/3078/loginri7.jpg[/img][/URL]
Totally New edge, Nothing is the same [URL=http://imageshack.us][IMG]http://img12.imageshack.us/img12/6998/edgehx2.jpg[/img][/URL]
**Clan Warz Pics** We have 2 gates, when u hit ::open it opens them ::close closes them, so when you are in a clan fight, you can stop them from attacking in your zone. There is also a zone for watches, so they cannot help the other team, they are totally stuck in there little box. [URL=http://imageshack.us][IMG]http://img6.imageshack.us/img6/411/clanwarzsa6.jpg[/img][/URL] [URL=http://imageshack.us][IMG]http://img12.imageshack.us/img12/698/clanmeetsk6.jpg[/img][/URL] [URL=http://img201.imageshack.us/my.php?image=85160529.png][IMG]http://img201.imageshack.us/img201/8195/85160529.png[/img][/URL] [URL=http://img15.imageshack.us/my.php?image=48035480.jpg][IMG]http://img15.imageshack.us/img15/9383/48035480.jpg[/img][/URL] [URL=http://img4.imageshack.us/my.php?image=46905401.jpg][IMG]http://img4.imageshack.us/img4/2262/46905401.jpg[/img][/URL]
Auto Filled Banks [URL=http://imageshack.us][IMG]http://img6.imageshack.us/img6/8460/bank1pf3.jpg[/img][/URL] [URL=http://imageshack.us][IMG]http://img149.imageshack.us/img149/4306/bank2ak6.jpg[/img][/URL]
[URL=http://imageshack.us][IMG]http://img136.imageshack.us/img136/5503/28261871wm2.jpg[/img][/URL] Some Commands: ::help ::teama ::teamb ::setstats (attack) (defense) (strength) (hits) (range) (prayer) (magic) ::skull ::online ::playerinfo there are more but cbf with posting them all.
Also to get rune, rares, and other items you must have pk points. All glitches are fixed so you cant kill a npc and get pk points, you cant double wield, you cant change stats in wild or in duel, you cant log out in wild, you cant teleport in wild, and many others..
Just come check it out, Thanks

item.title: *~*~*Rune Wars*~*~* Log in & Fu*kin Pk! 10-15 events/day --- {24/7}
item.dc:creator: @ixl_p0tz_ixl ixl p0tz ixl
item.description:
@ixl_p0tz_ixl wrote:

Casting Delay was removed over a week ago, Godspells have been grately reduced, If the fighting style was closer to rsc (like it was) people complain about not being able to 3 hit ever. You can post a vote on forums, if your suggestion wins, I will do it.

Read full topic

item.title: *~*~*Rune Wars*~*~* Log in & Fu*kin Pk! 10-15 events/day --- {24/7}
item.dc:creator: @lolwat22 lolwat22
item.description:
@lolwat22 wrote:

[quote=“pork pl0x, post:1, topic:267850”]the changes done by mageman, cody, and kasper have made this server much better than before. now there is no more staking, and it’s all about pking. come join, it’s much better than the other pking servers you may have seen. the mods and admins actually give a shit about the server and players.

and besides, there is ::setstats !

edit: when are you adding the webclient? i would be playing runewarz right now, but i’m on a public computer, because my computer priveleges have been revoked :([/quote]We’ll have the webclient online ASAP.

On-Topic: Bump.

Read full topic

item.title: *~*~*Rune Wars*~*~* Log in & Fu*kin Pk! 10-15 events/day --- {24/7}
item.dc:creator: @ixl_p0tz_ixl ixl p0tz ixl
item.description:
@ixl_p0tz_ixl wrote:

RuneWarz 1 is now Full Pking, Dueling is out — Also note this server is not as heavily monitored as our newer Skills and Staking server.

Both can be found on our forums, RuneWarz 2 includes all new maps and castles with moats, rune crafting (updated a little) and full working agility, also way more updates to come we are currently BETA testing this, but there will be no wipe

Creds to Reines,Xent,Motaro

Read full topic

i still say u are both wrong… you are wanting to ruin pking, really think about it… O wow another full rune kill, o well i can just get that off the ground… Pking is fucking useless if u just leave the items on the ground and dont give a shit, You have to have some kind of reward for pking… and jsut to pk and pk and pk without reward would lose players, I have tried it

item.title: *~*~*Rune Wars*~*~* Log in & Fu*kin Pk! 10-15 events/day --- {24/7}
item.dc:creator: @C-4 C-4
item.description:
@C-4 wrote:

ixl p0tz ixl:

Im probably speaking for everybody when i say this… but pking and taking no risks, defeats the whole purpose… If u are lets say 40 1 99 and u see a guy wearing rune ur lvl, you want to go after him right? or a guy wearing a phat… but if u can get all the items anyways it defeats the whole purpose and that certain “rush” you get goes away… I honestly think giving out any item is worthless and will make rune warz dead[br][br][size=1]Posted on: March 10, 2009, 07:42:53 pm[/size][hr]and to pesterd, we have added new landscape, were still working on it

but that won’t happen if rune is free and rares like p hats don’t exist fucking idiot… then the server would actually be about PKING…p0rks idea is ftw

Read full topic
